item.title: {PI} NPC HP Change?
item.dc:creator: @Cali_Tree Cali Tree
item.description:
@Cali_Tree wrote:

How do I change NPC Hp on a PI Base? I Went into EntityDef.Java(Client Sided) and changed the name of the NPC but how do I add more HP to it? I Went to NPC.cfg(Source Side) and Changed it but it Didn’t change it ingame… Any Help?

if(i == 3101 || i == 3102 || i == 3103) { entityDef.itemActions = new String[5]; entityDef.itemActions[1] = "Attack"; entityDef.anIntArray94 = new int[1]; // Number of anIntArray94 the NPC uses entityDef.anIntArray94[0] = 40955; entityDef.anInt77 = 10056; entityDef.anInt67 = 10055; entityDef.name = "King of Corrections"; entityDef.combatLevel = 785; entityDef.description = "Overall Corrector".getBytes(); }

Read full topic
